about_the_game:
Cute Fruit Game is a creative and challenging fruit-merge puzzle game where players combine different types of fruits to create higher-level fruits and earn more points. The game features a fresh, cartoonish art style with simple mechanics, but also offers plenty of strategy, making it suitable for players of all ages. Every merge brings an exciting sense of achievement, while keeping the experience lighthearted and fun.

Features:

  • Simple and intuitive merge mechanics: Just drag and merge fruits to combine them. Easy to pick up, perfect for players of all ages.

  • A variety of fruits: Enjoy different types of fruits, each with its own unique merging effects and visual designs.

  • Charming cartoon style: Bright and colorful visuals that offer a cheerful gaming experience.

  • Perfect for any time: Whether you have a few minutes or longer, this game is ideal for relaxing and having fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
